duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver a high-end, intimate hospitality experience rooted in deep wine knowledge, ensuring guests leave with a renewed appreciation for the wines.
Represent the company with elegance and engage guests with the rich history of the winery, weaving narratives that bring the wines and brand story to life.
Supervise the actions of the staff and follow up on guest issues in the absence of the General Manager.
Working closely with a select team of wine enthusiasts, cultivating a culture of knowledge sharing and mutual respect.
Initiating tastings and guiding guests through detailed insights about the selection, from flavor profiles to the intricacies of their origins.
Promoting exclusive wine club memberships with passion, emphasizing the unique offerings and benefits.
Providing concierge-level customer service for wine club members, offering unparalleled customer service during their visits.
Facilitating the training and coaching of team members on strategies and best practices for wine club sign-ups.
Coordinating with the wine club and winery teams to oversee the timely and accurate fulfillment and pickup of wine club allocations.
Leading and supporting upscale Outpost and Wine Club events, ensuring an atmosphere of sophistication and education.
Actively participating in the development and implementation of strategies to continuously improve the wine club experience.
Directing the actions of the team on the floor and handling guest issues that may arise to ensure guest satisfaction.
Participating in and contributing to monthly staff meetings and monthly inventory.
The following responsibilities are outside the scope of the Lead Wine Specialist position: Progressive Discipline, Scheduling, Payroll, Hiring/Termination, Floorplans/Section Assignment.

education_certification.credential: Seasoned background in wine with demonstrable expertise and passion.
